sentences.english: Koreans all cheat and plagiarize in universities.
sentences.chinese: 韓國人在大學裏沒幾個不作弊和剽竊。

sentences.english: He lifted several passages from that novel.
sentences.chinese: 他從那本小說裏剽竊了幾段文字。

sentences.english: It is a shameless piece of plagiarism .
sentences.chinese: 這是一個無恥的剽竊行爲。

sentences.english: However, in February 2007, the report was withdrawn amid accusations of plagiarism.
sentences.chinese: 但是，2007年2月，該報告卻因剽竊指控而被撤。

sentences.english: He just shamelessly ripped off other people’s ideas.
sentences.chinese: 他只是不知廉恥地剽竊他人的創意。

sentences.english: Omit the questionable passage and draw back from the edge.
sentences.chinese: 省去可疑的段落，從剽竊的邊緣上抽身而退。

sentences.english: Jinhui has denied stealing any of the software.
sentences.chinese: 金惠公司否認有任何剽竊行爲。

sentences.english: And make time's spoils despised everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 使時光的剽竊到處遭人齒冷。

sentences.english: Plagiarist showed up suddenly, attacking Genuine.
sentences.chinese: 剽竊者突然出現，並出手攻擊正版。

sentences.english: These lines are lifted from Wordsworth.
sentences.chinese: 這些詩句是從渥茲華斯那剽竊來的。

sentences.english: She expropriated my ideas for her own book.
sentences.chinese: 她剽竊我的主意來編書。

sentences.english: After Plagiarist snatched Genuine's Intellectual Property Rights, he walk away quickly.
sentences.chinese: 剽竊者搶奪正版的智慧財產權後，快步揚長而去。
他時常剽竊別人的見解。

sentences.english: Cannot saying for certain nevertheless is piracy, this is in jural say to be illogical.
sentences.chinese: 不過肯定不能說是剽竊，這在法律上說不通。

sentences.english: Academic plagiarism is seriously dealt with in the developed world.
sentences.chinese: 發達國家對學術剽竊問題都是慎重對待。

sentences.english: Essentially, self-plagiarism is duplication, it's a kind of cheating.
sentences.chinese: 本質上看，自我剽竊就是重複發表，是一種欺騙行爲。

definition: to condemn in speech and in writing (idiom)/to denounce by word and pen
to belittle/to disparage/to play down/to demean/to degrade/to devalue
lit. to put Zhang's hat on Li's head/to attribute sth to the wrong person (idiom)/to confuse one thing with another
to erase/to cover traces/to obliterate evidence/to expunge/to blot out/to suppress
